Question: In 2005, Tennessee retired this person's number (No.
Hints: This person led the league with 4,267 passing yards and threw 29 touchdowns; he was named first-team All-Pro and to the Pro Bowl.
This person was selected first overall in the 1998 draft by the Indianapolis Colts.
After a May 23 neck surgery, this person could not use the Colts' facilities for practice and workouts due to the NFL lockout.
